author: ktl_xv
content:
Hello, I've seen recently that State Expiry work is picking up again and I would like to help.

I had been contributing to Glados (Portal Network Monitoring) for about six months until the Portal project ended earlier this year.

I care deeply about having a censorship resistant path for expired state resurrection and would like to continue contributing.

I'll join the next SIC, but if there is something I can help out with meanwhile, please let me know
